markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Demon](/Traits.aspx?ID=42)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 630 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

A family of [fiends](/Traits.aspx?ID=70), demons hail from or trace their origins to the [Abyss](/Planes.aspx?ID=13). Most are irredeemably chaotic evil and have [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12).
name: Demon
